title: Ep 64 | Jase's Snake Protocol, Bringing Muslim Refugees to Jesus, and Al's 'Simping' Lesson
description:
Al teaches Phil and Jase what "simping" is, and Jase is NOT amused. Jase tries to figure out the redneck protocol on misidentified snakes. Jase and Al introduce a man who does amazing work converting Muslim refugees into brave Christian missionaries. And the guys answer a frequently asked question: Is there a wrong way to baptize someone?
